ActivityMetadata.Name: GH Update the authenticated user
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH Update the authenticated user
ActivityMetadata.Description: **Note:** If your email is set to private and you send an `email` parameter as part of this request to update your profile, your privacy settings are still enforced: the email address will not be displayed on your public profile or via the API.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

Update the authenticated user

**Note:** If your email is set to private and you send an `email` parameter as part of this request to update your profile, your privacy settings are still enforced: the email address will not be displayed on your public profile or via the API.

Method: Patch

OperationID: users/update-authenticated

EndPoint:

/user
